hero.title: Creating a Strong Password
hero.description: A password is a method to identify the user of the account, and it is considered one of the most important ways to protect your account. Just like you would put a lock on your house and only open it with a key, you should protect your account by setting up a strong password that only you know.

propertiesOfAStrongPassword.title: Properties of a Strong Password

properties.title: Complicated
properties.description: Contains lower-case and upper-case letters, numbers, and symbols.

properties.title: Impersonal
properties.description: Does not contain your name, your children's names, your birthday, nicknames, etc.

properties.title: Secret
properties.description: Only you should know your password. Do not tell it to anyone, even your best friend.

properties.title: Unique
properties.description: Is not used on any other account.

propertiesOfAStrongPassword.tip: The strongest passwords also do not contain consecutive letters or numbers (123, abc), or letters that are consecutive on the keyboard (qwe, jkl).

passwordManager.title: Password Managers
passwordManager.description: It's important to use a different password for each of your accounts to keep your information safe. But remembering multiple complex passwords can be difficult! To help you, you can use a password manager.
features: Automatically fills in your username and password into websites and apps.
Safely stores sensitive information such as credit card numbers.
